overview: Yoko Yuki reflects on her experience at her family home in Aichi during the COVID-19 state of emergency prior to returning to Tokyo. The multimedia animation approach and innovative use of audio recordings in her previous works 100percentElectrical and A Snowflake into the Night (JC 2019), and ZDRAVSTVUITE! and lost summer vacation (JC 2016) are again on display in this moving work. -JAPAN CUTS: Festival of New Japanese Film
title: June 4, 2020
